views.name: personalized_epub_books_view
views.definition: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `wp_personalized_epub_books_view` AS select `b`.`row_id` AS `book_row_id`,`b`.`title` AS `title`,`b`.`author` AS `author`,`b`.`publication_date` AS `publication_date`,`b`.`description` AS `description`,`b`.`cover_image_url` AS `cover_image_url`,`b`.`price` AS `price`,`b`.`currency_row_id` AS `currency_row_id`,`c`.`currency_code` AS `currency_code`,`c`.`currency_name` AS `currency_name`,`c`.`currency_symbol` AS `currency_symbol`,`b`.`download_storage_length` AS `download_storage_length`,`b`.`is_active` AS `is_active`,`b`.`customization_area_width` AS `customization_area_width`,`b`.`customization_area_height` AS `customization_area_height`,`b`.`default_line_thickness` AS `default_line_thickness`,`b`.`default_line_color` AS `default_line_color`,`b`.`autograph_keyword` AS `autograph_keyword`,`b`.`autograph_page_html_path` AS `autograph_page_html_path`,`b`.`date_created` AS `date_created`,`b`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`b`.`date_modified` AS `date_modified`,`b`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by` from (`wp_personalized_epub_books` `b` join `wp_personalized_epub_currencies` `c` on(`b`.`currency_row_id` = `c`.`row_id`))

views.name: personalized_epub_order_details_view
views.definition: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `wp_personalized_epub_order_details_view` AS select `d`.`row_id` AS `order_details_row_id`,`d`.`order_master_row_id` AS `order_master_row_id`,`o`.`first_name` AS `first_name`,`o`.`last_name` AS `last_name`,`o`.`email` AS `email`,`d`.`book_row_id` AS `book_row_id`,`b`.`title` AS `book_title`,`b`.`author` AS `book_author`,`d`.`quantity` AS `quantity`,`d`.`price` AS `price`,`d`.`personalization_request` AS `personalization_request`,`d`.`signature_data` AS `signature_data`,`d`.`line_color` AS `line_color`,`d`.`line_thickness` AS `line_thickness`,`d`.`date_created` AS `date_created`,`d`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`d`.`date_modified` AS `date_modified`,`d`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by` from ((`wp_personalized_epub_order_details` `d` join `wp_personalized_epub_order_master` `o` on(`d`.`order_master_row_id` = `o`.`row_id`)) join `wp_personalized_epub_books` `b` on(`d`.`book_row_id` = `b`.`row_id`))

views.name: personalized_epub_order_master_view
views.definition: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `wp_personalized_epub_order_master_view` AS select `o`.`row_id` AS `order_master_row_id`,`o`.`first_name` AS `first_name`,`o`.`last_name` AS `last_name`,`o`.`email` AS `email`,`o`.`currency_row_id` AS `currency_row_id`,`c`.`currency_code` AS `currency_code`,`c`.`currency_name` AS `currency_name`,`c`.`currency_symbol` AS `currency_symbol`,`o`.`total` AS `total`,`o`.`payment_integration_type_row_id` AS `payment_integration_type_row_id`,`pit`.`integration_name` AS `payment_integration_name`,`o`.`status_row_id` AS `status_row_id`,`s`.`name` AS `status_name`,`o`.`epub_filename` AS `epub_filename`,`o`.`is_downloaded` AS `is_downloaded`,`o`.`download_date` AS `download_date`,`o`.`download_guid` AS `download_guid`,`o`.`is_destroyed` AS `is_destroyed`,`o`.`destruction_date` AS `destruction_date`,`o`.`date_created` AS `date_created`,`o`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`o`.`date_modified` AS `date_modified`,`o`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by` from (((`wp_personalized_epub_order_master` `o` join `wp_personalized_epub_currencies` `c` on(`o`.`currency_row_id` = `c`.`row_id`)) join `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types` `pit` on(`o`.`payment_integration_type_row_id` = `pit`.`row_id`)) join `wp_personalized_epub_statuses` `s` on(`o`.`status_row_id` = `s`.`row_id`))

views.name: personalized_epub_payment_integration_details_view
views.definition: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_details_view` AS select `d`.`row_id` AS `payment_integration_details_row_id`,`d`.`order_master_row_id` AS `order_master_row_id`,`o`.`first_name` AS `first_name`,`o`.`last_name` AS `last_name`,`o`.`email` AS `email`,`d`.`payment_integration_type_row_id` AS `payment_integration_type_row_id`,`pit`.`integration_name` AS `payment_integration_name`,`d`.`transaction_details` AS `transaction_details`,`d`.`date_created` AS `date_created`,`d`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`d`.`date_modified` AS `date_modified`,`d`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by` from ((`wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_details` `d` join `wp_personalized_epub_order_master` `o` on(`d`.`order_master_row_id` = `o`.`row_id`)) join `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types` `pit` on(`d`.`payment_integration_type_row_id` = `pit`.`row_id`))

views.name: personalized_epub_payment_integration_settings_view
views.definition: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_settings_view` AS select `s`.`row_id` AS `setting_row_id`,`s`.`integration_type_row_id` AS `integration_type_row_id`,`t`.`integration_name` AS `integration_name`,`t`.`description` AS `integration_description`,`s`.`setting_name` AS `setting_name`,`s`.`setting_value` AS `setting_value`,`s`.`default_value` AS `default_value`,`s`.`help_text` AS `help_text`,`s`.`field_type` AS `field_type`,`s`.`date_created` AS `date_created`,`s`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`s`.`date_modified` AS `date_modified`,`s`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by` from (`wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_settings` `s` join `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types` `t` on(`s`.`integration_type_row_id` = `t`.`row_id`))

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_books_delete
personalized_epub_books_insert
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_books_insert`(
    IN p_title VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_author VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_publication_date DATE,
    IN p_customization_area_width INT,
    IN p_customization_area_height INT,
    IN p_default_line_thickness INT,
    IN p_default_line_color VARCHAR(20),
    IN p_autograph_keyword VARCHAR(50),
    IN p_autograph_page_html_path VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_is_active TINYINT,
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_books(title,author,publication_date,customization_area_width,customization_area_height,
        default_line_thickness,default_line_color,autograph_keyword,autograph_page_html_path,
        is_active,date_created,created_by,date_modified,modified_by)
    VALUES(p_title,p_author,p_publication_date,p_customization_area_width,p_customization_area_height,
        p_default_line_thickness,p_default_line_color,p_autograph_keyword,p_autograph_page_html_path,
        p_is_active,NOW(),p_user,NOW(),p_user);
    SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS new_id;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_books_select_paginated
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_books_select_paginated`(
    IN p_page INT,
    IN p_page_size INT,
    IN p_search_term VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_is_active TINYINT
)
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;

    SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, customization_area_width, customization_area_height,
           default_line_thickness, default_line_color, autograph_keyword, autograph_page_html_path,
           is_active, date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_books
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR author LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_is_active IS NULL OR is_active = p_is_active)
    ORDER BY title
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_books
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR author LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_is_active IS NULL OR is_active = p_is_active);
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_books_select_single
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_books_select_single`(
    IN p_id INT
)
BEGIN
    SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, customization_area_width, customization_area_height,
           default_line_thickness, default_line_color, autograph_keyword, autograph_page_html_path,
           is_active, date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_books
    WHERE id = p_id
    LIMIT 1;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_books_update
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_books_update`(
    IN p_id INT,
    IN p_title VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_author VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_publication_date DATE,
    IN p_customization_area_width INT,
    IN p_customization_area_height INT,
    IN p_default_line_thickness INT,
    IN p_default_line_color VARCHAR(20),
    IN p_autograph_keyword VARCHAR(50),
    IN p_autograph_page_html_path VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_is_active TINYINT,
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    UPDATE wp_personalized_epub_books
    SET title=p_title,author=p_author,publication_date=p_publication_date,
        customization_area_width=p_customization_area_width,customization_area_height=p_customization_area_height,
        default_line_thickness=p_default_line_thickness,default_line_color=p_default_line_color,
        autograph_keyword=p_autograph_keyword,autograph_page_html_path=p_autograph_page_html_path,
        is_active=p_is_active,date_modified=NOW(),modified_by=p_user
    WHERE id=p_id;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_books_upsert
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_books_upsert`(
    IN p_title VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_author VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_publication_date DATE,
    IN p_customization_area_width INT,
    IN p_customization_area_height INT,
    IN p_default_line_thickness INT,
    IN p_default_line_color VARCHAR(20),
    IN p_autograph_keyword VARCHAR(50),
    IN p_autograph_page_html_path VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_is_active TINYINT,
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_books(title,author,publication_date,customization_area_width,customization_area_height,
        default_line_thickness,default_line_color,autograph_keyword,autograph_page_html_path,
        is_active,date_created,created_by,date_modified,modified_by)
    VALUES(p_title,p_author,p_publication_date,p_customization_area_width,p_customization_area_height,
        p_default_line_thickness,p_default_line_color,p_autograph_keyword,p_autograph_page_html_path,
        p_is_active,NOW(),p_user,NOW(),p_user)
    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE publication_date=VALUES(publication_date),customization_area_width=VALUES(customization_area_width),
        customization_area_height=VALUES(customization_area_height),default_line_thickness=VALUES(default_line_thickness),
        default_line_color=VALUES(default_line_color),autograph_keyword=VALUES(autograph_keyword),
        autograph_page_html_path=VALUES(autograph_page_html_path),is_active=VALUES(is_active),
        date_modified=NOW(),modified_by=p_user;
END

    IN p_default_value VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_help_text VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_field_type ENUM('textarea','textinput','checkbox','checkboxlist','dropdown'),
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values(setting_name, setting_value, default_value, help_text, field_type,
        date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by)
    VALUES(p_setting_name, p_setting_value, p_default_value, p_help_text, p_field_type, NOW(), p_user, NOW(), p_user);
    SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS new_id;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_book_default_values_select_paginated
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values_select_paginated`(
    IN p_page INT,
    IN p_page_size INT,
    IN p_search_term VARCHAR(100)
)
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;

    SELECT row_id, setting_name, setting_value, default_value, help_text, field_type,
           date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR setting_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR setting_value LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
    ORDER BY setting_name
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR setting_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR setting_value LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'));
END

END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_book_default_values_upsert
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values_upsert`(
    IN p_setting_name VARCHAR(100),
    IN p_setting_value VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_default_value VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_help_text VARCHAR(255),
    IN p_field_type ENUM('textarea','textinput','checkbox','checkboxlist','dropdown'),
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_book_default_values(setting_name, setting_value, default_value, help_text, field_type,
        date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by)
    VALUES(p_setting_name, p_setting_value, p_default_value, p_help_text, p_field_type, NOW(), p_user, NOW(), p_user)
    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE setting_value = VALUES(setting_value), default_value = VALUES(default_value),
        help_text = VALUES(help_text), field_type = VALUES(field_type), date_modified = NOW(), modified_by = p_user;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_business_info_settings_select_by_group
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings_select_by_group`(
    IN p_setting_group VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    SELECT id, setting_name, setting_value, setting_group, date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings
    WHERE setting_group=p_setting_group
    ORDER BY setting_name;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_business_info_settings_select_paginated
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings_select_paginated`(
    IN p_page INT,
    IN p_page_size INT,
    IN p_search_term VARCHAR(100),
    IN p_setting_group VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;
    SELECT id, setting_name, setting_value, setting_group, date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term='' OR setting_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR setting_value LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_setting_group IS NULL OR p_setting_group='' OR setting_group=p_setting_group)
    ORDER BY setting_name
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term='' OR setting_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR setting_value LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_setting_group IS NULL OR p_setting_group='' OR setting_group=p_setting_group);
END

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings_select_single`(

)
BEGIN
    SELECT id, setting_name, setting_value, setting_group, date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_business_info_settings
    WHERE setting_name=p_setting_name
    LIMIT 1;
END

BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;

    SELECT id, currency_code, currency_name, symbol, is_active,
           date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_currencies
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR currency_code LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR currency_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_is_active IS NULL OR is_active = p_is_active)
    ORDER BY currency_name
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_currencies
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR currency_code LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR currency_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_is_active IS NULL OR is_active = p_is_active);
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_currencies_upsert
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_currencies_upsert`(
    IN p_currency_code VARCHAR(10),
    IN p_currency_name VARCHAR(50),
    IN p_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    IN p_is_active TINYINT,
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_currencies (currency_code, currency_name, symbol, is_active,
         date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by)
    VALUES (p_currency_code, p_currency_name, p_symbol, p_is_active, NOW(), p_user, NOW(), p_user)
    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE currency_name=VALUES(currency_name), symbol=VALUES(symbol),
        is_active=VALUES(is_active), date_modified=NOW(), modified_by=p_user;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_order_details_delete
personalized_epub_order_details_insert
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_order_details_insert`(
    IN p_order_master_row_id INT,
    IN p_book_row_id INT,
    IN p_customization_request_details TEXT,
    IN p_status VARCHAR(20),
    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO wp_personalized_epub_order_details(order_master_row_id,book_row_id,customization_request_details,
        status,date_created,created_by,date_modified,modified_by)
    VALUES(p_order_master_row_id,p_book_row_id,p_customization_request_details,p_status,NOW(),p_user,NOW(),p_user);
    SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS new_id;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_order_details_select_by_order
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_order_details_select_by_order`(
    IN p_order_master_row_id INT
)
BEGIN
    SELECT od.id, od.order_master_row_id, od.book_row_id,
           b.title AS book_title, b.author AS book_author,
           od.customization_request_details, od.download_guid,
           od.status, od.cancellation_details,
           od.date_created, od.created_by, od.date_modified, od.modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_order_details od
    LEFT JOIN wp_personalized_epub_books b ON od.book_row_id = b.id
    WHERE od.order_master_row_id = p_order_master_row_id
    ORDER BY od.date_created;
END

    WHERE id=p_id;
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_order_master_select_paginated
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_order_master_select_paginated`(
    IN p_page INT,
    IN p_page_size INT,
    IN p_search_term VARCHAR(100),
    IN p_status VARCHAR(20),
    IN p_date_from DATETIME,
    IN p_date_to DATETIME
)
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;

    SELECT id, download_guid, customer_name, customer_email, status, cancellation_details,
           date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_order_master
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR customer_email LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_status IS NULL OR p_status = '' OR status = p_status)
      AND (p_date_from IS NULL OR date_created >= p_date_from)
      AND (p_date_to IS NULL OR date_created <= p_date_to)
    ORDER BY date_created DESC
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_order_master
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR customer_email LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
      AND (p_status IS NULL OR p_status = '' OR status = p_status)
      AND (p_date_from IS NULL OR date_created >= p_date_from)
      AND (p_date_to IS NULL OR date_created <= p_date_to);
END

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_order_master_select_single
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_order_master_select_single`(

           date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_order_master
    WHERE id = p_id
    LIMIT 1;
END

        date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by)

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_payment_integration_details_select_by_order
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_details_select_by_order`(
    IN p_order_master_row_id INT
)
BEGIN
    SELECT d.row_id, d.order_master_row_id, d.payment_integration_type_row_id,
           t.integration_name, t.integration_code,
           d.transaction_details, d.date_created, d.created_by, d.date_modified, d.modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_details d
    LEFT JOIN wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types t ON d.payment_integration_type_row_id = t.row_id
    WHERE d.order_master_row_id = p_order_master_row_id
    ORDER BY d.date_created;
END

    IN p_user VARCHAR(50)
)
BEGIN
    UPDATE wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_details
    SET transaction_details = p_transaction_details,
        date_modified = NOW(), modified_by = p_user
    WHERE row_id = p_row_id;
END

    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE transaction_details = VALUES(transaction_details),
        date_modified = NOW(), modified_by = p_user;
END

        date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by)

storedProcedures.name: personalized_epub_payment_integration_types_select_paginated
storedProcedures.definition:
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types_select_paginated`(
    IN p_page INT,
    IN p_page_size INT,
    IN p_search_term VARCHAR(100)
)
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT;
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_page_size;

    SELECT row_id, integration_name, integration_code, description, is_active,
           date_created, created_by, date_modified, modified_by
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR integration_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR integration_code LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'))
    ORDER BY integration_name
    LIMIT v_offset, p_page_size;

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records
    FROM wp_personalized_epub_payment_integration_types
    WHERE (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR integration_name LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%') OR integration_code LIKE CONCAT('%',p_search_term,'%'));
END

BEGIN

   action, change_description, date_created, created_by)

   NEW.field_type, 'INSERT', 'Record created', NEW.date_created, NEW.created_by);
END
